website_summaries.verdict: A well-made fondue pot by a top brand in kitchen items. A great choice for consumers who prefer an electric-powered unit.
pros: Features a 3 quart capacity that makes enough for groups
The brand's DuraCeramic coating resists stuck-on food, making it easy to clean
It's also PFOA and PTFE free
Electric cord has a break-away feature to prevent spills
cons: Doesn't have a wide range of heat settings
Some reports of fondue pots that quit working after several uses

website_summaries.verdict: A large and versatile fondue pot that heats quickly and gets hot enough to use with oil.
pros: This 3-quart fondue pot is suitable for all three types of fondue
It features 8 fondue forks and a fork holder ring
The ceramic material is non-stick, PFOA- and PTFE-free, scratch-resistant, and easy to clean
cons: The magnetic breakaway plug can detach rather easily and the temperature can run hotter than expected

customer_reviews.title: Love this Fondue Pot!
customer_reviews.text: The the best fondue pot I have ever used. My old pot from the 1980s from Oster works well, but this pot is cream of the crop. My other pot by another manufacturer has been a pain since day one. This was easy to assemble and use. Did not have to worry about scratching teflon. Easy to clean. Nice safety features so if someone tangles in the cord it detaches. I would buy another one and probably will since fondue is a favorite in our family.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great little fondue pot!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for chocolate, cheese and meat fondue! My family loves this!
customer_reviews.author: April Sundell

customer_reviews.title: This fondue pot was perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This fondue pot was perfect for us. My old one used sterno and the heat was somewhat unreliable. This pot is electric and the heat is adjustable. It is easy to clean which I consider important. If I had to say anything negative, it might be that the cord is short. On the other hand, some might find a longer cord inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Burns food
customer_reviews.text: If i could leave less than one star i would. Maybe i am missing something but i made my fondue on the stove, transferred it over to the fondue pot. Put it just on warm within 5 minutes thinking it was ok checked. It was burned to a crisp and had to throw it all away!!! Made it the next week just to make sure. As soon as it hit warm and i mean barely hit warm it bubbled up!! There is $50 in cheese i will never get back!
customer_reviews.author: tammy zywicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fondue Pot!
customer_reviews.text: Moved over from a classic style with the real fire to this one, and I'll never go back. So easy to control the temperature, and so easy to wipe clean. Really happy. I do wish the cord was a bit longer, but we just use an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: gdesignr

customer_reviews.title: Worked once, then broke
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! Used this one time, cleaned as directed - wiped with soft cloth, did not submerse in water, and it never worked again. Will not turn on - indicator light on cord will not light up, pot will not get warm. Purchased and used in January 2019 and tried to use again in March 2019. It has passed AMZN's one month return window so have contacted Oster directly. Will see what they say. Was fun while it lasted but cannot it good conscious recommend unless Oster makes this right.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as for cheese fondue during holidays. It shows variety of heat settings, but it’s only super hot and boiling hot! Will not ever use again!
customer_reviews.author: teresa r

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fondue pot. I have used it several times since I got it. Very fast service too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen a meeks

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a fondue party for my daughter’s birthday but it didn’t heat up at all - broken straight out of the box. Definitely try it out before you plan on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Broken fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and was very careful when cleaning it not to submerge any parts in water, but it just quit working. We plugged it in the 3rd time we wanted to use it and it wouldn’t heat up. I am very disappointed since it was a birthday present for my daughter and we only had it a month before it quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wainscott

customer_reviews.title: Great pot, doesn't stick afterwards so makes it really ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pot, doesn't stick afterwards so makes it really easy to clean. I only wish the cord was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D

customer_reviews.title: FUNDOOO
customer_reviews.text: This gorgeous red fondue pit cane securely packaged. It has a beige ceramic interior , 8 color marked forks, and a fork rest rim. It looks so appealing, especially filled. Made the easiest & best cheese fondue ever. Clean up a breeze. We enjoyed it immensely . The temp dials work accurately. The only con ernie is that it is nearly impossible not to accidentally scrape the ceramic bottom. Am hoping that won't create issues later with scratches and sticking. So far we are more than happy with this purchase. The recipe booklet is great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THE INCLUDED FORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fondue pot. It gets hot enough to cook very well, it's very stable so as to avoid spillage, and it's well-made. Two things to be aware of: 1) The dial on the heat control goes up to 400 degrees. In fact, it only gets up to about 211 degrees, which is plenty hot to cook your food. I'm not sure why they chose to say 400 on the dial. 2) Don't use the metal fondue forks that come with the unit. They will scratch the very good non-stick surface very easily. The instruction book even says, "Do no use metal forks". Pay heed to their advice.
customer_reviews.author: John Zehr

customer_reviews.title: Cord too short
customer_reviews.text: The pot worked well and was easy to clean, but was NOT easy to use because the cord is too short to reach a wall socket unless a table is placed right against that wall. The instructions say not to use an extension, so I was left with either having my fondue cool too much or having my guests get up and go to the pot each time they wanted to dip something into the fondue. If the manufacturer would have made the cord 3-4 times aw long, I would probably have given it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customert

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, this does not work
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Do not buy it. After buying a brand new one, I just tried to use it today. It would not even heat. I followed the instructions 10 times and it still would not work. Unfortunately my return window closed because I did not use it in first 30 days. Have to now deal with the manufacturer for limited warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_1978

customer_reviews.title: Works ok. Temp control is pointless
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these to have multiple fondue going at the same time. There is a temperature dail on the plug that ranges from warm to hot. They may as well no put that there. Warm setting makes it boil same as hot setting. when doing cheese or chocolate you have to constantly turn it on and off to keep from burning thr food. Works great for the broth to cook meats. Great non stick surface. Cheese and chocolate slid right out when we were cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Life on the Blend

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far :)
customer_reviews.text: I love it, arrive one week ago, Exactly what we looking for Electric fondue, it is simple, look nice and easy to clean, I hav use for this for 6 times so far. I do recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent heating!
customer_reviews.text: Heats well, but temp doesn’t stay consistent. The plastic cover to hold the forks bent due to the steam and heat of the pot. I have make cheese and stock fondues!
customer_reviews.author: SouthLaneDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Nice pot.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fondue pot. It's compact enough to fit nicely on the table but large enough to have plenty of fondue. Kids find it fun.
customer_reviews.author: stacy pipkin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working first time used
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 last year To be prepared for our fondue on the following Christmas. The one lasted about halfway through the meal and then completely shut down. Had to bring an old fondue pot out and transfer the oil. I bought it so long ago, even though it just came out of the box, a refund is not offered. I probably will not buy that brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FONDUE POT A COUPLE MONTHS IN ADVANCE TO GIVE AS A BIRTHDAY PRESENT. OPENED THE BOX THIS WEEKEND AND TO OUR DISAPPOINTED SURPRISE, THE FONDUE POT DOES NOT WORK. NOT EVEN SLIGHTLY WARM. COLD TO THE TOUCH. LESSON LEARNED. DO NOT BUY NAME BRAND ITEMS IN ADVANCE, TRUSTING REPUTATION AND USING "PAY FOR WHAT YOU GET" MENTALITY, AND LEAVE THEM NICELY PACKAGED FOR A LATER DATE. UNBOX AND TEST THEM FOR QUALITY DEFECTS IMMEDIATELY SO THAT THE WINDOW FOR RETURN DOES NOT ELAPSE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a relatively inexpensive fondue pot for parties. This had good reviews, so I took a shot and was pleasantly surprised. First, I am used to cheap fondue pots that take forever to heat up. I put water in to see how long it would take to boil, set the temp to 250 and in just a couple minutes, had a rolling boil. This thing can get hot fast. The power cords is also easily removable. Highly recommend for both low temp fondue as well as oil cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ruddi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t rely on namebrand’s reputation!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get it to turn on; heating element must be defective. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Has two modes, off and boil, no matter how you set the dial. Failure.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fondue Pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Fondue Pot last year for the Holidays and loved it so much, bought another so that I could have two different types of Fondue for a party. The only thing that would be a draw back is that the cord is magnetic so you have to use an extension cord or you will be plugging it back in frequently if it gets bumped.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Worked, twice then wouldn't heat
customer_reviews.text: We used this fondue pot twice for our vacation place and it worked as advertised. Third time, it wouldn't heat. I plan to shop for a 1970's 'made in USA' fondue pot like the one I have at home to replace this 'made in China' junk.
customer_reviews.author: patwis

customer_reviews.title: For the price, a great product!
customer_reviews.text: We decided since we were in quarantine and nothing was normal, why have a traditional Easter dinner? So, we went for fondue. We were not disappointed! What a great fondue pot! There were 5 of us sharing and there was plenty of room for the cheese and all of us dipping. For the price, amazing.
customer_reviews.author: liz k

customer_reviews.title: Reliving dinners from the '80's and LOVING it!
customer_reviews.text: Had an electric fondue pot back in the '80's and just about wore it out. I purchased this for my significant other, who had never owned an electric one, and he used it every single night the first week after it arrived!
customer_reviews.author: GeeJay12

customer_reviews.title: This our second Oster Fondue pot, and like it
customer_reviews.text: The porcelain lining is nice, our last one had no Teflon, which was great as it was easy to clean. Porcelain makes more sense, closest to the original Swiss fondue pot, we still have from our trip to Zurich, but with the new fangled electricity thing (smile). So much easier than alcohol or "Sterno" heat cans.
customer_reviews.author: RhodeNet

customer_reviews.title: Don't Turn On High and Walk Away
customer_reviews.text: This is great..the whole thing can go in the dishwasher. This unit has a very short cord and a really odd way of using a magnet to attach the cord to the unit, never have seen this style before. I used it once and really like it, it does not however have a lid, so taking it to a table without power will be a problem it cools rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Self-Made

customer_reviews.title: Great all around! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Warms up quickly and evenly, does cheese, broth and chocolate well so far. I couldn’t have been happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Great! Fun! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit at our house! We have only used it for chocolate so far (but, honestly, that's all I want it for). We packed it and brought it on a ski trip. It was a delicious treat after skiing all day! The recipe included is quick and easy. It only takes a few minutes for it to heat up and be ready to use. The pot was incredibly easy to clean! The only negative about this is the short cord it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for chocolates BUT Cord is too short points up and weak magnets which detaches too Easily
customer_reviews.text: I had to take a star away for the power cord. The magnets do not hold the cord on well, it points upward which makes it detach just by being touched.' Get past that issue which is fairly big and you have a great 5 star Fondue Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Gandolf

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have owned a few of these over years. They work great and look nice. Cleaning is no issue. Only issue we have had is with magnetic power cord into the controller. Two broke and you can find parts anymore
customer_reviews.author: Professor Mort

customer_reviews.title: Seems great except for cord length.
customer_reviews.text: The electric cord is only 30 inches long and instructions state to not use an extension cord. This means that the fondue pot needs to be placed within 30 inches of a wall socket. It is unlikely that most places the fondue pot would be used would be only 30 inches from a wall socket. In my arrangement I will have no choice but to use an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer TW

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The prong stick notches on the top rim of the cooker are worthless. They do not hold your stick in place. It needs to be re worked, however the pot works great. Would have given 5 stars if the notches worked.
customer_reviews.author: trae

customer_reviews.title: stopped working the second time in use
customer_reviews.text: Used it the first time February 29 2020 for cheese fondue, worked fine except for some scorching around the heat source. Second time to use was 5/16/2020 for a different cheese fondue recipe and it worked long enough to melt cheeses, then stopped. Moved the pot to different electrical outlets, checked fuses, nope, it was the pot, the light on the temperature control module did not show the red indicator light, no heat generated, it's dead. DISAPPOINTED :-(
customer_reviews.author: DJ Mike

customer_reviews.title: Melts chocolate quickly!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to melt chocolate for movie nights. It melts super fast and evenly. The only thing I don't like is that the sides get hot, so the kids had to learn not to touch it while dipping the fruit inside. Can't wait to try it with some other items.
customer_reviews.author: JW1190

customer_reviews.title: Fondue in a Snap!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves to use this product. Appetizer Cheese fondue with apples and bread. Main Course Chicken and steak in hot oil, then dipped in a variety of sauces. Dessert Chocolate with marshmallows and strawberries. We live it!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was concerned buying a cheaper product but found this to work very well. Excellent quality and user friendly. I had it out of the box and working after a quick wash within five minutes. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My oster fondue pot that was my mom's tgat was at least 30 years old finally died. So i purchased this one and i love it! It cleans so easy and it is very durable. Hopefully i have this one for 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Mad as hell
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT hold temperature at all ! Used it twice. It will go high heat even on warm then Nothing . No control whatsoever. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Warm setting temperature is way too hot!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give a bad review but I received my pot yesterday. I tried it out last night. I used the warm setting and within 15 seconds the cheese was boiling. I had to keep turning it off and to avoid burning the cheese and eventually the cheese wound up burning. Unless mine is defective, the pot heats up way too high.
customer_reviews.author: steven s.

customer_reviews.title: Fondue for All!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a party, and it brought all the feels of community and belonging again. Great item for a wonderful dinner party with family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: ravens fan

customer_reviews.title: Just like I remembered
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Oster fondue pot I've bought. My other two were perfectly fine after 20 years but got lost in a move. :( They are reliable, even heating and so fun! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, heats very fast, as long as you use this properly you will not be disappointed. It is large enough to serve a party. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Great Valentine's Day Activity with Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: For Valentine's Day, I had each of my 4 grandkids bring something they wanted to dip in chocolate and we had a great time. Perfect size for a simple family event.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Hosted our first fondue night and this was perfect. Easy to clean, heats up quickly, non stick scratch resistant surface. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, had a little trouble finding just the right temperature, but it was super fun to use. I just use an extension cord so I can use it picnic style with the family on movie night.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: Great little fondue set
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Missed our vacation to Switzerland due to Covid and bought this to attempt to recreate the real deal. Works great!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fondue Pot, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We have an old fondue pot that requires use of the little burners or fondue gel but that isn't easy to find. This fondue post is great as it will get to exactly the temperature we want and stay that way for the duration of our meal. It's easy to clean and I like the detachable plug that is held on via magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Great last minute gift
customer_reviews.text: Love this...surprisingly HOT and cooked beef fondue tonight with ease! My only suggestion is to have the bowl be removable for cleaning. It was very easy to clean but I imagine with time and use it will get harder.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Great fondue pot. Made steak fondue for family Christmas. Not a lot is splatter or table cleanup. It was a hit with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Norden

customer_reviews.title: I like it !
customer_reviews.text: It gets really hot really fast and might burn the food so don’t leave it unattended! But it works good. It’s not that easy to clean the outside of the pan because it’s connected to the cable part.
customer_reviews.author: Yasrandy

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: Only have used it for cheese fondue so far and it worked amazing and the cleanup was super easy. Has a dial with the temperature with the temp ranges written out for chocolate cheese and oil.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for our family fondue nights. We can cook the meat, veggies and make the fondue all in one pot. It’s easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: ATal808

customer_reviews.title: Great dinner/appetizer idea and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Was really craving some fondue so we bought this little guy during quarantine. It was a great investment. We’ve done cheese fondue and chocolate fondue. Super easy to clean and easy to use. Loved that it came with the sticks for dipping too.
customer_reviews.author: lauren b

customer_reviews.title: Mixed
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I bought this fondue pot because I had an old one same brand. My problem is that the heating probe doesn’t fit properly. The result is that it keeps sliding out. It really is a problem. The heating probe from my old fondue pot works best. The problem being, my old heating probe is cracked. ASIDE from THAT, it is nice. Not sure what happened with the design. Hope they fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one that I have bought, and it is because it is so wonderful as gifts
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Hard to regulate temperature
customer_reviews.text: Love using this fondue pot but hard to regulate temperature to keep food warm but not boiling. I have been turning temp up and down as needed.
customer_reviews.author: pad

customer_reviews.title: Fondue
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The pot is really big. The low setting still had our cheese bubbling
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and makes delicious fondue!
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version of this fondue pot until my husband dropped it on the ground and broke it! I bought this as a replacement and it’s even better than the last. It is so much easier to clean and the color of the inside of the pot makes it easy to see if you missed something when cleaning! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Valentine's Day Present
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for Valentine's Day when my wife asked if I could handle dinner this year. Neither of us had ever made fondue before, and this pot was fun and easy to use. Recommended for anyone wanting to try out the art of melting cheese or chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: John Theadore

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! My family loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is all my 6yr old asked for for Christmas. It has been a blast to use! Easy to clean and keep up with, does a great job. Makes for fun eating and family time.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Great product with easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with fondue and have 4 pots. This is so much easier to clean than the non-stick one I replaced. Now I don’t have to deal with cheese gunk. It just slides off.
customer_reviews.author: ilovekeroppi2

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and works well. Draws a lot of power.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holst

customer_reviews.title: It's a blast!
customer_reviews.text: It heats up the oil so fast! Works perfectly! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Malone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the bowl. Was super easy to clean. Loved that it does not require flame with the grandkids around, it does restrict location of use but it works out. It was used several times during the holidays and loved using it for a variety of sauces. Dunnto use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Timmer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a lemon?
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work. We tried multiple plugs and it didn’t work. We had another Oster fondue pot for years and it worked fine. Disappointed, possibly a lemon? Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Grace M. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Great fondue pot!
customer_reviews.text: It gets warm quickly and melts the cheese evenly. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: CMLAW2017

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic interior makes for easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: We have other fondue pots, but this one is SO easy to clean (even thick cheese fondue)!!! One caution - It does heat up fast and higher than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Molly A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good melting pot
customer_reviews.text: Great size, heats evenly, cleans up easily, grooves to hold skewers for multiple people use. Nice size bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Abby kav

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.text: I love my fondue pot! It is so easy to use and clean. It warms quickly and comes with sample recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: The fondue pot was great however WOULD HIGHLY recommend a longer cord. It was not long enough for me to have it on the table for everyone to use adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. Where the power cord meets the pot - disconnects at will. It just falls out. Meaning you go back to check your food - and it’s cold. We tried to tape or strap it to know avail. Big thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: NoChlorine4Me

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: You cannot replace the cord - ours stopped working and could not replace because of the cord connection (magnetic) - cannot not find where to order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Over nearly 60 years of marriage (we got married in "the uear of the fondue pot" and got 4 as gifts) I've owned at least 6 or 7 fondue pots. This is the best by a mile.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Works well but hard to keep it plugged in
customer_reviews.text: We love it but the plug in is magnetic and it is hard to keep it plugged in when using it. Heats up quick and works well! Love the red color!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Yulich

customer_reviews.title: Everything taste better dipped in cheese
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like the pre made packages of cheese fondue, made my own and it was good, nice little fondue pot, we love it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Grace Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Wrong power cord
customer_reviews.text: Power Cord didn’t fit , wrong one . I opened the box and put it away for a party , party night main coarse fondo..... nope wrong plug and return policy had exspired
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: This is my first fondue pot. I use this one primarily for chocolate. The pot melts my chocolate fast and evenly. When it's time for clean up, it is fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good product and best value for money
customer_reviews.text: This fondue pan is very easy to use, the temperature adjustment helps a lot. It's also very easy to clean, I loved it! It is just a little bit big for my need (2 people) but it's definitely an excellent product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Heats up FAST!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pure magic. It heats up really fast so you can get your fondue party on! Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited bought for my boyfriends birthday. Last night tried it out and the plug has a bad connection so you have to hold it really tight for the light to come on but as soon as you let go it shuts off :(
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Arneson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Despite all of our efforts, this device doesn't heat. Of course, by the time we tried it out and realized this, we've passed the return date. Anyone want a red bowl???
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: I've only used for fondue but it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice family size
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice size, holds a lot of fondue and holds temp.
customer_reviews.author: srose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first 5 times. It’s now broken and will not heat up. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: casey kliebert

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave the Oster fondue pot to my granddaughter (8 years old) for Xmas. Works perfectly for her and friends. So far, she has made cheese fondue and chocolate covered strawberries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It did not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this did not work. I don't know how to contact the sellers since I bought it in September and only just now opened it. I am so disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Oster Titanium Infused DuraCeramic Fondue Potuct
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color. The kids loved it. I love it. Easy to clean. Can use for Fondue or to keep dips hot for a party. Similar to a crock pot. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: THEOSH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and heats up quick
customer_reviews.text: This fondue pot boils almost INSTANTLY which is insane and awesome for fast fondue. Got this as a Christmas present for my mom and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, works perfectly, and very easy to clean. Did beef and cheese fondues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anca

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great for eating as a family with older children. The skewers were a little difficult to put in the spots on the lid thing. Over all great and fun product!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lil pot.
customer_reviews.text: Used this thing for cheese and chocolate, haven't done meats yet. It heats up hella quick.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: The best fondue pot ever. Love it love it love it!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Ann Torgerson

customer_reviews.title: Fun-due!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out for the first time last night and everything was easy to make in the pot. We did both a cheese and a chocolate fondue and it was extremely easy to clean between recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect non stick fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: We love this pot! Cook's great and is really easy to clean, no sticking! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted one use
customer_reviews.text: We used this once and it was great. Second time, it would not even turn on. Sadly, you don't fondue often so the second use was 4 months later. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for REAL fondue!
customer_reviews.text: We love fondue! This fondue was perfect! It heats up the oil perfectly and super easy to clean. We do have to use an extension cord since the cord isn't long enough, which would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

product_meta.title: Oster Titanium Infused DuraCeramic Fondue Pot, 3 Quart, Eggshell/Red
product_meta.description: Shape the night for lively meals with friends and family using the Oster Titanium Infused DuraCeramic Fondue Pot. This fondue pot features titanium-infused DuraCeramic coating that lasts eight times longer and cooks up to 30 percent faster than standard nonstick coatings, saving you time and energy. The safe and natural ceramic coating is scratch resistant and PFOA- and PTFE-free, won’t flake or peel, and wipes clean easily. A removable, adjustable temperature control lets you accurately set the cooking temperature, while the magnetic breakaway cord provides added safety. This electric fondue set includes eight fondue forks, a removable plug, and a fork holder ring.
feature_bullets: 3-quart fondue pot with titanium-infused DuraCeramic nonstick coating lasts 8x longer than standard nonstick coatings
PFOA- and PTFE-free surface cooks up to 30% faster and wipes clean easily
Removable, adjustable temperature control for convenient operation
Magnetic breakaway cord offers added safety
Fondue kit includes 8 fondue forks, removable plug, and fork holder ring
